data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Wales that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wales, United Kingdom
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Wales, United Kingdom.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Wales, United Kingdom.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Wales, United Kingdom that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Libyan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Libyan people.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Wales, United Kingdom so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Wales, United Kingdom.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Wales, United Kingdom has a population of 3,113,200.

We estimate Wales has 236,207 people who might know Jesus, 1,515,394 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,361,599 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Wales, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
